amendment.description: Amendment adds language expressing the sense of Congress regarding comments made by Chinese Major General Zhu Chenghu.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in part B of House Report 109-175 to express the sense of Congress that recent comments made by Chinese Major General Zhu Chenghu's openly advocating the use of nuclear weapons against the United States damages U.S.-China relations and violates China's commitment to resolve its differences with Taiwan peacefully; and to express further that the government of the People's Republic of China should renounce the use of force against Taiwan, disavow General Zhu's statements, and remove Zhu from his position.
